primary.title: Kala
primary.description: The Origin Planet where the Mantles first created Human life.

primary.title: Constella
primary.description: A Cyberpunk planet - home of Tachyon and the Mantle of Abundance.

primary.title: Perpetua
primary.description: A steampunk pirate planet. Arguably the most peaceful planet in Kalpa, home to the Orchid's and the Mantle of Logic.

secondary.title: Isotope
secondary.description: The only planet in Kalpa where life evolved naturally.

secondary.title: Karmana
secondary.description: A mostly snowy and frozen planet where life is incredibly harsh.
